name: Forecasting & Modelling
description: Research focussed on forecasting the spread or modelling the dynamics of the virus

name: Infection Reports
description: Research documenting cases of virus spread through and between communities or countries

name: Transmission
description: Research studying the means of transmission of the virus

name: Contact Tracing
description: Research studying the implementation and effect of contact tracing

name: Prevalence
description: Research studying the level of infections in different communities

name: Prevention
description: Research examining tools for slowing the spread of the virus (e.g. PPE)

name: Surveillance
description: Research developing methods for surveillance of the disease spread

name: Clinical Reports
description: Clinical reports of patients discussing their symptoms or clinical course

name: Risk Factors
description: Research examining risk factors for infection and severe symptoms

name: Long Haul
description: Research examining the long-term effects on coronavirus patients

name: Pediatrics
description: Research studying the effect of the virus on children

name: Medical Specialties
description: Research examining the effect on and mitigations required by different medicial specialties

name: Recommendations
description: Research providing recommendations to medical professionals and others related to coronavirus

name: Imaging
description: Research documenting CT and other scans of patients

name: Diagnostics
description: Research developing and testing methods to diagnose the virus

name: Healthcare Workers
description: Research studying the effect of the virus on healthcare workers

name: Molecular Biology
description: Research studying the molecular biology of the virus or host

name: Immunology
description: Research studying the interactions of the virus and the immune system

name: Model Systems & Tools
description: Research proposing new model systems, tools and assays to study the virus

name: Non-human
description: Research examining the effect of the virus in animals

name: Therapeutics
description: Research studying the use of new and existing drugs for combating the virus

name: Drug Targets
description: Research discussing potential therapeutic coronavirus targets

name: Vaccines
description: Research examining the development of vaccines

name: Clinical Trials
description: Registered clinical trials for treating the virus

name: Medical Devices
description: Research investigating medical devices used to treat the virus

name: Psychology
description: Research studying the effect on patients' and healthcare workers' mental health and understanding of risk

name: Health Policy
description: Research discussing proposed and implemented health policy and its effect on the virus and society

name: Communication
description: Research examining health messaging and communication with the general public and health professionals

name: Inequality
description: Research studying the uneven health and economic outcomes for different groups

name: Education
description: Research examining the effect of the coronavirus on the education system and how it has changed

name: Reviews
description: Review articles focussing on a variety of topics related to the virus

name: Meta-analysis
description: Research that is a meta-analysis examining and combining results of other research studies

name: Comments & Editorials
description: Commentary, editorials and other short articles that are not original research

name: CDC Weekly Reports
description: CDC Weekly Reports that provide a summary of the latest information about the pandemic

name: Book Chapters
description: Book chapters that provide reviews or research on coronaviruses

name: News
description: News articles from academic journals and other sources indexed by PubMed or CORD-19

name: Non-medical
description: Research examining the effect of the virus on other research areas (e.g. economics)

name: Retractions
description: Articles that have been withdrawn by the authors or the journal

name: Misinformation
description: Research studying the challenges of misinformation and deceptive communications involving the pandemic
